alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 3:10PM CDT until March 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN STORY...HARDIN...WEST CENTRAL GRUNDY AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 310 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roland, or 13 miles north of Nevada, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Garden City around 315 PM CDT. Radcliffe and Drake Airport around 320 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hubbard, Buckeye, Alden, Owasa and Iowa Falls Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 122 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Iowa. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
